version_description:
-LGee now support WebOs models.
-You can now remove ads
-iOS 9 improvements

-Fix crash on channel Down (sorry about that).
-Other minors improvement

Remember that you can remove the advertising of the application from the menu.
If you like the app, leave us 5 stars on the App Store Thanks for support.

-iOS11 Support.
-Design improvements
-Compatible with the New iPhone 8 and iPhone 8Plus (iPhone X ready)
-You can now get a new real remote directly from the settings menu.

Improve the tv detection process with webos.
Fix the display on screen with zoomed option.
Add 3D Touch feature.

Reload a TV scan directly from the main screen.
Minor bugs fixed.
iOS 11 optimisation.

Update scan process
Best support for iOS14

We have fixed some issue due to our last update of last week :
-We have fixed some crashes which appears for some user when the home button is pressed.
-We have added a timeout for scan process
-Better design for the scan view on the last iPhone models.
